title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When I open the context menu, the 'Team' entry is missing.
EB: When I open the context menu, the 'Team' entry should be present.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer. 
2. Open the context menu and observe that the 'Team' entry is missing.
